oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Key perennial weeds in arable crops in the Nordic countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Salonen, Jukka
Andersson, Lars
Andreasen, Christian
Semb Torresen, Kirsten
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Our review on the most common perennial weeds in the Nordic countries draws on 1) a Nordic/Baltic joint desk-top study done in 1997-99, 2) information from national weed surveys and 3) expert opinions from Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Salonen, Jukka; Andersson, Lars; Andreasen, Christian and Semb Torresen, Kirsten (2008) Key perennial weeds in arable crops in the Nordic countries. Paper at: Perennial weeds a growing problem : an EWRS-NJF workshop, Wageningen, The Netherlands, 10-12 November 2008.
